alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 23 at 1:41AM MST until November 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches. Locally higher amounts are possible on Casper Mountain. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations and Casper Mountain. * WHEN...From 5 AM Thursday to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult late Thanksgiving afternoon and evening due to the combination of snow and wind. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow and strongest wind is likely to occur between 3 PM Thanksgiving and sunrise Friday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
